name: emscripten-fs-example
description: An example project for porting a command-line C program to a JavaScript library using Emscripten.

scripts.build:debug: mkdirp build && cd build && emcmake cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug .. && make && cp-cli example.js ../lib/example.js
scripts.build:release: mkdirp build && cd build && emcmake cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release .. && make && cp-cli example.js ../lib/example.js

author: Dami√°n Silvani
